stripped_text: If Award Bait is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Award Bait, you may place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
text:
If Award Bait is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Award Bait, you may place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
title: Award Bait
